subgraph Observability_Layer

    A1[Metrics Collector - Prometheus]
    A2[Log Aggregator - Loki / ELK / Fluentd]

    A4[Dashboard - Grafana]
    A5[Alert Manager - Prometheus Alertmanager]
    A6[Audit Log DB - TimescaleDB / Postgres]

end
